purchase.subscriptionDescription: A subscription gives you access to AI features and tokens every month. You can cancel anytime.
purchase.tokensDescription: Tokens are used for AI generations: virtual try-on, outfit creation, and clothing variations.
purchase.restoredMessage: Your purchases have been successfully restored.
purchase.ruPaymentNotice: For users in Russia, card payment is available through our website.
purchase.subscriptionTerms: Subscription renews automatically. You can cancel anytime in App Store or Google Play settings. Terms of use and privacy policy are available on our website.
purchase.tokensTerms: Tokens don't expire and can be used anytime. Terms of use are available on our website.

payment.ruNotice: For users in Russia, payment is available through the website. Click the link below to proceed.
